mapper.select: select * from reservation_record order by no desc
select * from reservation_record where pno=#{pno} order by no desc
select * from reservation_record where result='치료완료' and pno=#{pno} order by rdate desc
select * from reservation_record where pno=#{pno} and result='접수완료' and rtype not in (select rtype from reservation_record where rtype='ft' and rtype='nt')

select * from reservation_record where rdate like concat('%',#{keyword1},'%') and ename like concat('%',#{keyword2},'%') and rtype like concat('%',#{keyword3},'%') and result like concat('%',#{keyword4},'%') order by no desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
mapper.sql: where rdate like concat('%',#{keyword1},'%') or ename like concat('%',#{keyword2},'%') or rtype like concat('%',#{keyword3},'%') or result like concat('%',#{keyword4},'%')
mapper.select: select count(no) from reservation_record where rdate like concat('%',#{keyword1},'%') and ename like concat('%',#{keyword2},'%') and rtype like concat('%',#{keyword3},'%') and result like concat('%',#{keyword4},'%')
mapper.update: update reservation_record set reception_info=#{reception_info}, result=#{result}, result_memo=#{result_memo} where rno=#{rno} and rtype=#{rtype}
update reservation_record set therapy_info=#{therapy_info}, result='치료완료' where rno=#{rno} and rtype=#{rtype}
update reservation_record set ename=#{ename}, rdate=#{rdate}, rtime=#{rtime} where rno=#{rno} and rtype=#{rtype}
